T02D3113:212a-1: pra tishshpi bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D3113:212a-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D3113:212a-4: 'phags ma gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3113:212a-5: bla ma rje btsun sprul pa yi //
T02D3113:212a-6: rang bzhin lha mo gus btud de //
T02D3113:212a-7: rab gnas cho ga bsdus pa yi //
T02D3113:212a-8: man ngag rim pa bri bar bya //
T02D3113:212a-9: de la gang zag thams cad la //
T02D3113:212a-10: rab gnas 'thad pa ma yin te //
T02D3113:212a-11: skye ba med pa'i ngo bo la //
T02D3113:212a-12: gang gis gang la ji ltar ni //
T02D3113:212a-13: rab tu gnas par bya ba yod //
T02D3113:212a-14: kun rdzob la yang gnas pas ni //
T02D3113:212a-15: de yi byin rlabs mi shes pas //
T02D3113:212a-16: rab gnas cho ga 'thad pa min //
T02D3113:212a-17: las dang po yi rnal 'byor la //
T02D3113:212a-18: rgyud sbyangs dad dang nges bskyed phyir //
T02D3113:212a-19: rab tu gnas pa bya bar gsungs //
T02D3113:212a-20: de la dang por slob ma yis //
T02D3113:212a-21: gzhi dang rdzas rnams tshogs gyur nas //
T02D3113:212a-22: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la //
T02D3113:212a-23: lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab //
T02D3113:212a-24: gnang ba byin la bla ma yis //
T02D3113:212a-25: bsnyen pa'i cho ga brtsam par bya //
T02D3113:212a-26: rab 'bring rtags dang ldan pas ni //
T02D3113:212a-27: sta gon cho ga la 'bad bya //
T02D3113:212a-28: sa chog la sogs sngon 'gro sa'i //
T02D3113:212a-29: dkyil 'khor khrus kyi stegs bu dag / bstar ba
T02D3113:212b-0: ba yi rnam lngas byug / brtan @212b ma'i cho
T02D3113:212b-2: de nas bum pa mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D3113:212b-3: bkru dang brgyan pa la sogs bya //
T02D3113:212b-4: rang rang mtshan ma bkod la gzhag / bskyed dang bzlas pa rdzogs par bya //
T02D3113:212b-5: rnam rgyal bum par chu bsdus la //
T02D3113:212b-6: gzungs thag rdo rjes bzung la gzhag / de nas mchod bstod rgyas par bya'o //
T02D3113:212b-7: bum pa sta gon bya ba'o //
T02D3113:212b-8: zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang //
T02D3113:212b-9: rgyu skar bcu bzhi la bab dang //
T02D3113:212b-10: tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid la //
T02D3113:212b-11: rgyas pa'i rab gnas la sogs bya //
T02D3113:212b-12: de nas rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi //
T02D3113:212b-13: dgram dang 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan gyis//
T02D3113:212b-14: gnas khang brgyan dang mchod pa bsham //
T02D3113:212b-15: lugs ma la sogs stegs bu ste //
T02D3113:212b-16: ras ris la sogs byang du bsgrig / khrus dang mchod pa'i rdzas tshogs bya //
T02D3113:212b-17: ras ris sku la dkris byas te //
T02D3113:212b-18: byur bsal la sogs cho ga ni //
T02D3113:212b-19: yungs kar chu dang 'bru zan dang //
T02D3113:212b-20: d'ur bas byabs te sbyang bar bya //
T02D3113:212b-21: aom badzra ba dra zhes pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02D3113:212b-22: de nas ba yi rnam lnga dang //
T02D3113:212b-23: bdud rtsi lnga yis snod bkang la //
T02D3113:212b-24: d'ur ba'i pir gyis bkru bar bya //
T02D3113:212b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:212b-26: de nas til mar dri zhim pa //
T02D3113:212b-27: spos kyis bsgos pas gong ltar byug / de yi sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D3113:212b-29: de nas de ni bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D3113:212b-31: aa shvadtha dang n+ya gro dang //
T02D3113:212b-32: parka ti yi shun pa yi //
T02D3113:212b-33: phye mas bskus te bkru bar bya //
T02D3113:212b-34: de nas skyu ru ra sogs pa //
T02D3113:212b-35: 'dag chal kun gyis byug par bya //
T02D3113:212b-36: de nas bum pa'i chu gcang dang //
T02D3113:212b-37: dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis bkru //
T02D3113:212b-38: bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems //
T02D3113:212b-39: grub pa'i rig 'dzin la sogs kun //
T02D3113:212b-40: bkra shis brjod dang mchod bstod bsam //
T02D3113:212b-41: lha mos chu ni blugs bsam ste //
T02D3113:212b-42: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3113:212b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ltar //
T02D3113:212b-44: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D3113:212b-45: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D3113:212b-46: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:212b-47: de nas chu yi thigs pa dag / ras bal 'jam pas phyi bar bya //
T02D3113:212b-48: ras ris glegs bam la sogs pa //
T02D3113:213a-2: me long sogs la khrus sogs bya //
T02D3113:213a-3: de ni khrus kyi cho ga yin //
T02D3113:213a-4: tsandan gnyis dang gur gum dang /
T02D3113:213a-5: lang gu ldan te dri lnga yis //
T02D3113:213a-6: rten la thig le byas de nas //
T02D3113:213a-7: aom khrus kyi cho ga yin //
T02D3113:213a-8: tsandan gnyis dang gur gum dang //
T02D3113:213a-9: lang gu ldan te dri lnga yis //
T02D3113:213a-10: rten la thig le byas de nas //
T02D3113:213a-11: aom badzra gandha a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:213a-12: de nas mchod ba rnam lnga sogs //
T02D3113:213a-13: rang rang sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D3113:213a-14: de nas ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D3113:213a-15: nam mkhar sbyan drangs mchod bstod la //
T02D3113:213a-16: khyad par rigs kyi lha bltas te //
T02D3113:213a-17: thugs ka sbyi bo mgrin pa dang //
T02D3113:213a-18: phrag pa rdo rje dang bcas pas //
T02D3113:213a-19: reg la lag tu spos thogs te //
T02D3113:213a-20: bus mo sar bcugs lce h'um las //
T02D3113:213a-21: rdo rje dmar por bya ste brjod //
T02D3113:213a-22: bcom ldan gtsug tor gdugs dkar can //
T02D3113:213a-23: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3113:213a-24: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can khyod kyis //
T02D3113:213a-25: sang ni rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D3113:213a-26: slob ma la ni brtse ba dang //
T02D3113:213a-27: khyod rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D3113:213a-28: gus pas bdag dang de la ni //
T02D3113:213a-29: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D3113:213a-31: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D3113:213a-32: dgra bcom byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02D3113:213a-33: gang yang sngags kyi lha gzhan dang //
T02D3113:213a-34: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D3113:213a-35: bstan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing //
T02D3113:213a-36: byang chub la brten 'byung po dang //
T02D3113:213a-37: rdo rje spyan ldan sems can rnams //
T02D3113:213a-38: rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag / rigs pa yi ni rgyal bo yi //
T02D3113:213a-39: ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang //
T02D3113:213a-40: 'gro ba zhi bas rab gnas bgyid //
T02D3113:213a-41: slob ma mchod dang bdag la ni //
T02D3113:213a-42: khyod kyis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas //
T02D3113:213a-43: rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis //
T02D3113:213a-44: thugs brtser ldan pas gnas par mdzod //
T02D3113:213a-45: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes //
T02D3113:213a-46: nam mkha'i lha rnams dam tshig bstim //
T02D3113:213a-47: byin rlabs dbang bskur rgyas gdab bya'o //
T02D3113:213a-48: de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dang //
T02D3113:213a-49: sgra yi tshogs ba dpag med dbul //
T02D3113:213a-50: de nas bum chus slar yang bkru //
T02D3113:213a-51: de nas lha yi sngags dag ni //
T02D3113:213a-52: skyon lnga spangs la bzlas par bya //
T02D3113:213a-53: de nas dang por gsol btab la //
T02D3113:213a-54: rnam par byon par 'dod pa yis //
T02D3113:213a-55: tshigs bcad yang ni yi ge bya //
T02D3113:213b-0: mtha' ma mu: @213b yis mtshan pas gshegs //
T02D3113:213b-1: rdzas kyis g-yogs te gzhag par bya //
T02D3113:213b-2: slob ma yod na sta gon bya //
T02D3113:213b-3: 'di ni lha yi sta gon no //
T02D3113:213b-5: thig tshon la sogs bya ba ni //
T02D3113:213b-6: rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ltar //
T02D3113:213b-7: mchod pa'i dngos po gser thur dang //
T02D3113:213b-8: rgyan dang sku chings glegs shing dang //
T02D3113:213b-9: na bza' la sogs rgyas par bya //
T02D3113:213b-10: dkyil 'khor bskyed la bzlas sogs bya //
T02D3113:213b-11: dbang blang dam tshig rdzogs par bya //
T02D3113:213b-12: de nas gzhi ma bkru la sogs //
T02D3113:213b-13: gong gi cho ga ltar bya'o //
T02D3113:213b-14: de nas sa bon lha bkug la //
T02D3113:213b-15: nam mkha' gnas la mchod bstod bya //
T02D3113:213b-16: spos dang rdor dril thogs nas su //
T02D3113:213b-17: pus btsugs gong ltar byin brlabs te //
T02D3113:213b-18: sang ni rab gnas bgyid lags na //
T02D3113:213b-19: zhes pa bgyid par 'tshal du bsgyur //
T02D3113:213b-20: de nas ye shes spyan drangs la /
T02D3113:213b-21: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug bya //
T02D3113:213b-22: de nas mchod bstod rol mo'i sgra ;
T02D3113:213b-23: / dpag med mchod dang gnas gsum brlab //
T02D3113:213b-24: dbang bskur byas te bum chus bkru //
T02D3113:213b-25: rnam snang rang gi rigs kyi lha //
T02D3113:213b-26: gang yin pas ni rgyas gdab bo //
T02D3113:213b-27: de nas dbang gzhan rim pas bskur //
T02D3113:213b-28: aom badzra a'a bha ra na bi bhu sha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:213b-29: zhes pas rgyan gyis mchod pa 'bul//
T02D3113:213b-30: de nas rang rang rigs kyis bstod //
T02D3113:213b-31: gser thur aa dza na byugs pas //
T02D3113:213b-32: spyan dbye sngags ni 'di yin no //
T02D3113:213b-33: aom tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ni badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:213b-34: aom aanda sa m'a dhi dhy'a nam pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:213b-35: zhes pas bza' ba bzang po dbul //
T02D3113:213b-36: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi //
T02D3113:213b-37: sngags kyis zhabs bkod dbul ba ni //
T02D3113:213b-38: rdo rje bzung ba'i lag g-yas kyis //
T02D3113:213b-39: lan gsum bskor la brtan par bya //
T02D3113:213b-40: de nas su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3113:213b-41: zhes pas gnas su gzhug par bya //
T02D3113:213b-42: de nas mchod bstod rgyas par bya //
T02D3113:213b-43: de nas bla mas slob ma la //
T02D3113:213b-44: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
T02D3113:213b-45: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02D3113:213b-46: ji skad gsungs bzhin spyan dbye ba //
T02D3113:213b-47: de ni ngas kyang byas 'gyur te //
T02D3113:213b-48: khyod kyi de ni kun rdzob pas //
T02D3113:213b-49: ci bde bar ni mchod par byos //
T02D3113:213b-50: zhes bya zhal khebs la sogs bya //
T02D3113:213b-51: de nas slob mas mchod pa dang //
T02D3113:213b-52: bla ma yon gyis mnyes par byas//
T02D3113:214a-0: @214a * // bla mas legs ldan gtor mas mchod //
T02D3113:214a-1: byin chen bkra shis yun ring du //
T02D3113:214a-2: bzhugs par bka' yis chos skyong bsgro //
T02D3113:214a-3: gsol btab la sogs bla mas bya //
T02D3113:214a-4: slob ma'i sgrib pa gzhom pa dang //
T02D3113:214a-5: rang gi lhag chad bskang ba'i phyir //
T02D3113:214a-6: sbyin sreg cho gas bskang par bya //
T02D3113:214a-7: bsdu gshegs smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D3113:214a-8: mchod bstod la sogs rgyas par bya //
T02D3113:214a-9: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'di //
T02D3113:214a-10: k'a ma dha nu'i rjes 'brangs te //
T02D3113:214a-11: padma'i lcags kyus mtshan pa yi //
T02D3113:214a-12: dge slong gis sbyar bsod nams kyis //
T02D3113:214a-13: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyang ;
T02D3113:214a-14: / sprul pa'i sku dang mnyam 'gyur shog / mang
T02D3113:214a-15: du thos pa'i slob dpon padma'i lcags kyus rigs ldan
T02D3113:214a-16: ha ra ba'i slob dpon k'a mal dhe nu pa'i
T02D3113:214a-17: rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T02D3113:214a-19: // / a'a ts'arya bi na ya tsandra dang /
